title: Noam Chomsky on Keir Starmer's attack on the Labour left, the war on unions and the future of AI
description:
Professor Noam Chomsky took time out of his busy schedule to sit down for a wide ranging chat with PoliticsJOE. The discussion ranged from the growing momentum behind labour movements worldwide and the threat they pose to power structures worldwide, the elite's hijacking of the Labour party post-Corbyn and what it means for the future of British politics, and the future of AI and whether it is a danger to humankind as we know it.

Interviewer: Oli Dugmore

Subscribe to our new podcast now, or you're a silly goose: 
https://linktr.ee/pubcast
tags: Noam Chomsky on the future of the left
